About us

Kissos products is an emerging company that supplies high quality traditional products from all over Greece to the rest of Europe and worldwide. Our colleagues meticulously select producers and partners across Greece in order to ensure and preserve top quality products.

Our main purpose is to supply only premier (Π.Ο.Π.) protected designation of origin(P.D.O.) products.

All goods are accompanied by the necessary certifications.

Our products include:

  • Dried figs from Northern Evia.
    They belong to the family of super foods for its beneficial nutritional profile, full of fibre, calcium antioxidant, and cholesterol free!!!
  • Organic essential levander oil.
    From the mountains of central Macedonia, which is famous for its numerous therapeutic and cosmetic applications.
  • Organic Greek mountain tea.
    Is made from the leaves of plants from the Sideritis species and exhibits various beneficial properties to the digestive system due to its antioxidant and anti inflamatory effects. While latest researchers found that it can prevent or even reverse Alzheimer's disease!!!
  • Extra virgin olive oil.
    From the rich land and plentiful sun of the island of Crete, is the cornerstone of Mediterranean diet.
    They also called "yellow gold" rich in flavour, and nutrition Cretan extra virgin oil stand outs for its top quality!!!
  • Olives from Chalkidiki.
    Olives have been part of people’s diet, especially in the mediterranean for thousands of years. Stuffed or not, tossed into salads, garnishing martinis and other beverages or just eaten on their own with olive oil and lemon, olives have significant health and longevity benefits.
  • Pomegranate products.
    Pomegranate is the fruit of natural health, full of antioxidants, fiber, proteins, vitamins C and K.
    Products that include pomegranate such as balsamic vinegar, sauces, jam, and essential oil are manufactured by natural and handmade processes . All production has been without additives or preservatives.
